CustomField.formula:
IF( CONTAINS($User.UIThemeDisplayed, 'Theme4'),
IF( ISBLANK( Internal_Status__c ), IF( OR(Status__c = 'Paid', Status__c = 'Closed'), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/green-flag.png", "Paid"), IF( Type__c = 'Credit Memo', IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/yflag.png", "Unapplied"), IF( Amount_Overdue__c > 0, IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/red-flag.png", "Overdue") , IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/yflag.png", "Open" ) ) ) ), IF(OR(Internal_Status__c = 'Pending',Internal_Status__c = 'Open/Partial'), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/yflag.png","Open"), IF(OR(Internal_Status__c = 'Invoiced In Full',Internal_Status__c = 'Closed'),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/green-flag.png", "Paid"),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/X.png", "X"))) ),
IF( ISBLANK( Internal_Status__c ), IF( OR(Status__c = 'Paid', Status__c = 'Closed'), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Paid", 16, 16), IF( Type__c = 'Credit Memo', IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Unapplied", 16, 16), IF( Amount_Overdue__c > 0, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Overdue", 16, 16) , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Open", 16, 16) ) ) ), IF(OR(Internal_Status__c = 'Pending',Internal_Status__c = 'Open/Partial'), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/yflag.png", "Open" , 16, 16), IF(OR(Internal_Status__c = 'Invoiced In Full',Internal_Status__c = 'Closed'),IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Paid", 16, 16),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/X.png", "X", 16, 16))) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Flag
